meta.title: About | Dough & Beats
meta.description: Our story: bringing authentic panuozzo and good vibes to London events.

header.title: Our Story
header.subtitle: Two friends turning a shared love for flavour and music into a fresh London street food experience.

story.subheading: Bringing something fresh to London's street food scene.
paras: We specialise in Italian style pizza sandwiches panuozzo made with 24-hour fermented dough, baked in a Gozney ovens. Every bite combines classic Italian ingredients with our own bold flavours, creating food that’s crisp, airy, and unforgettable.

From intimate weddings to bustling festivals, we bring restaurant quality catering with energy, music, and good vibes. For us, it’s never just about what’s on the plate it’s about creating a moment people remember.

content.heading: Introduction
content.body: Dough & Beats (“we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our services, including our website and any integration with third-party applications like Instagram.

content.heading: Information We Collect
content.body: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, such as your name and email address. When you authorize our application to access your Instagram account, we may collect information from your Instagram profile, including your public photos, profile information, and other data you have made public.

content.heading: How We Use Your Information
content.body: We use the information we collect to operate and improve our services, including to display your Instagram photos within our application. We will not use your information for any other purpose without your consent.

content.heading: Sharing Your Information
content.body: We will not share your information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

content.heading: Your Rights
content.body: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have other rights under applicable data protection laws.

content.heading: Contact Us
content.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@doughandbeats.co.uk.

meta.title: User Data Deletion | Dough & Beats
meta.description: Instructions on how to delete your user data from Dough & Beats.

header.title: User Data Deletion
header.subtitle: How to request the deletion of your data.

content.heading: Requesting Data Deletion
content.body: To request the deletion of your data, please send an email to hello@doughandbeats.co.uk with the subject line “Data Deletion Request.” Please include your Instagram username in the body of the email.

content.heading: Data Deletion Process
content.body: Once we receive your request, we will delete all of your data from our systems within 30 days. This includes any information we have collected from your Instagram profile.

content.heading: Contact Us
content.body: If you have any questions about our data deletion process, please contact us at hello@doughandbeats.co.uk.
